meanings.definition: In a manner related to the use of an oscillograph.
meanings.sent2: The scientist analyzed the data oscillographically.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched the moving line on the screen oscillographically.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked oscillographically, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The colors danced oscillographically, creating a mesmerizing display.

meanings.definition: Using an oscillograph to record or display data.
meanings.sent1: He decided to oscillographically record the electrical signals.
meanings.sent2: The technician oscillographically monitored the voltage changes.
meanings.sent3: The students oscillographically captured the sound waves for their project.
meanings.sent4: She oscillographically displayed the heart rate graph for analysis.
meanings.sent5: The machine oscillographically traced the movement of the pendulum.
